#colnames

```{r}
StuDF2 <- data.frame(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
StuDF2 
```


```{r}
colnames(StuDF2) 
rownames(StuDF2)
```

```{r}
colnames(StuDF2) <- c("ww","oo","kk")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2
```
#若只改一個
```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)[[3]] <- c("哈")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2
```
#若改兩個
```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)[c(1,2)] <- c("了","屋")
colnames(StuDF2) 
StuDF2
```
